advancement.akumatization.miraculous.kam: Provide power to another player with an akumatization
Use the butterfly miraculous to akumatize yourself
advancement.akumatization.miraculous.tra: Accept an akumatization from the Butterfly miraculous holder
akumatization.configuration.enable_kamik: Enable rejection of akumatization by the victim
book.akumatization.wiki.apis.abilities.d: Supernatural abilities that can be used by Miraculous holders or Akumatizations
book.akumatization.wiki.apis.advancement:
This trigger is called when a player akumatizes another player. It has one parameter:
- "type": The type of akumatization that was used.

This trigger is called when a player releases a purified akuma. It has one parameter:
- "count": The number of purified akumas that were released.

This trigger is called when a player is transformed by a akumatization. It has two parameters:
- "type": The type of akumatization that was used.
- "self": Whether the player akumatized themselves.

This trigger is called when a player uses a akumatization ability. It has two parameters:
- "type": The type of akumatization that was used.
- "context": The context in which the power was used. Can be one of the following:
    - empty
    - block
    - entity
    - living_entity
    - item
book.akumatization.wiki.apis.data_maps.l:
Contextual lucky charms are determined for entities, miraculous holders, and akumatizations via data maps.
They are located in "data/<namespace>/entity_type/lucky_charms.json",
"data/<namespace>/mineraculous/miraculous/lucky_charms.json",
and "data/<namespace>/mineraculous/kamikotization/lucky_charms.json".
Generators can be found online [here](https://beta-jsons.thomasglasser.dev/partners/).
book.akumatization.wiki.apis.kamikotizat:
Akumatizations have a few fields that determine how they work:
- active_ability: The ability that is activated when the Activate Power button (default: O) is pressed.
- default_name: The default name of the akumatization.
- item_predicate: The predicate that determines if the akumatization can be applied to an item.
- passive_abilities: The abilities that are active at all times when akumatized.
A generator for akumatizations can be found online [here](https://beta-jsons.thomasglasser.dev/mineraculous/kamikotization/).
book.akumatization.wiki.expansions.kamik: An expansion mod adding all Akumatizations from the show into the game.

For customization purposes, the base mod adds no Akumatizations by default.
Instead, the Kamikotizations expansion mod is available to add all Akumatizations from the show into the game.
Updates release alongside the base mod,
adding all the Akumatizations from that season.
Akumas can only be obtained via spawn egg in the creative menu.

Once powered, akumas follow their owner if they're transformed.
If not, they also fly around aimlessly.

Unpowered akumas are normal butterflies.
They just fly around aimlessly.
If an open butterfly cane or powered butterfly miraculous holder are nearby, they will fly around it.
NOTE: The following features are only available if the server manually enables it.\
\
The look of your akumatizations can be further customized by putting files in the 'kamikotizations' subfolder of the 'miraculouslooks' folder in the client's minecraft directory.\
A guide for customizing can be found [here](https://beta-jsons.thomasglasser.dev/guides/customization/).

Powers given by the [Butterfly Miraculous](entry://miraculous/butterfly) to normal players. Addons can add entries to this category describing their akumatizations (see [this page](https://klikli-dev.github.io/modonomicon/docs/basics/structure/entries) for more info).

The only way to receive an akumatization is from a powered [Akuma](entry://flora_and_fauna/kamikos).
The owner of the akuma will choose an akumatization with powers for you based on the items in your inventory.
It will then send the akuma to you and it will enter that item.
You have the option to accept the powers, or you can reject the akumatization if the server allows it.

Akumatizations are revoked when the akumatized item is destroyed or when the [Butterfly Miraculous](entry://miraculous/butterfly) holder chooses to revoke the akumatization.
This will release the akuma from the item and remove the akumatization and powers.

When you are akumatized, your akumatized item will either be turned into a tool or you will be given an ability to use on key press (default: O).
This tool and ability will be different depending on the akumatization, so refer to the [Akumatizations](category://kamikotizations) category for more info.
book.akumatization.wiki.miraculous.butte:
The Butterfly Miraculous has 3 abilities:
- Akumatization
- Akuma Control
- Akumatized Communication

The Butterfly Miraculous has 3 abilities:
- Blade
- Block
- Akuma Store
- Throw

The Akuma Control ability can be activated by pressing the Activate Power button (default: O) with a powered [Akuma](entry://flora_and_fauna/kamikos) nearby.
It will cause a mask to appear on your face and will allow you to see through the eyes of the [Akuma](entry://flora_and_fauna/kamikos).
You can then press the number keys to select a target that the [Akuma](entry://flora_and_fauna/kamikos) will fly to.
Once it reaches the target, it will open the Akumatization Selection Screen and allow you to akumatize the target.

Akuma Store mode allows you to right click to store a powered [Akuma](entry://flora_and_fauna/kamikos).
You can then right click again to release the [Akuma](entry://flora_and_fauna/kamikos).

The Akumatization ability can be activated by pressing the Activate Power button (default: O) with no powered [Akumas](entry://flora_and_fauna/kamikos) nearby.
It will cause particles to come from your hand.
You can then interact with an unpowered [Akuma](entry://flora_and_fauna/kamikos) to power and tame it.

The Akumatized Communication ability can be activated by pressing the Activate Power button (default: O) with a akumatized player nearby.
It will cause a mask to appear on your face and the player's face and will allow you to see through their eyes.
You can then speak to the player or revoke their akumatization.
book.akumatization.wiki.miraculous.custo:
Akumatization looks can be customized in the 'kamikotizations' subfolder.
You can provide a custom texture, model, glowmask, and transforms with an id that is used in the command.
The only required file is the texture.
If only the texture is provided, it will use the default model.
book.akumatization.wiki.miraculous.ladyb:
Purify mode allows you to catch and purify powered [Akumas](entry://flora_and_fauna/kamikos) with left click.
You can capture as many as you want and right click to release them all at once.
entity.mineraculous.kamiko.cant_kamikoti: Akumatizing transformed players is not currently supported.
gui.kamikotization.name: Akumatization
mineraculous.no_kamikotizations: No Akumatizations found in world, have you installed any addons?
